__TOC__


If quorum was reached on an application and the votes were in favor the following steps need to be taken:
* report to CC and <nowiki>[[DeveloperMembershipBoard|Developer Membership Board]]</nowiki>:
** in case the applicant gains <nowiki>[[Membership]]</nowiki> through joining the team: mail to '''CC''' about the intention to add a new member to the team (application details, votes in favour (who), link to IRC log)
** in case the applicant gains upload rights through joining the team: mail to '''<nowiki>[[DeveloperMembershipBoard|Developer Membership Board]]</nowiki>'''  about the intention to add a new member to the team (application details, votes in favour (who), link to IRC log)
** Note: if an applicant gains both, send the mail to both the '''CC''' and the '''<nowiki>[[DeveloperMembershipBoard|Developer Membership Board]]</nowiki>'''
* "doing the honours": adding the person to the team
* prepare a quick introductory text about the applicant and send/add a welcome note to:
** <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-devel|ubuntu-devel]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-motu|ubuntu-motu]]</nowiki> (CC Mark Shuttleworth!)
** <nowiki>[[UWN]]</nowiki> - Ubuntu Weekly News (in the "General Community News" section)
* Update the <nowiki>[[MOTU-Council-Meeting|meeting agenda]]</nowiki>.
